mapper.select: /* sndngStat - mts발송결과통계 조회 */ SELECT * FROM mtssndngstat(#{SCH_ST_DT}, #{SCH_END_DT}) AS TBL( SCHEMA_ID TEXT , ASP_CUST_KEY TEXT , CUSTCO_NM TEXT , CUSTCO_LOGO TEXT , ATALK BIGINT , ATALK_SUCCESS BIGINT , ATALK_FAIL BIGINT , FTALK BIGINT , FTALK_SUCCESS BIGINT , FTALK_FAIL BIGINT , SMS BIGINT , SMS_SUCCESS BIGINT , SMS_FAIL BIGINT , LMS BIGINT , LMS_SUCCESS BIGINT , LMS_FAIL BIGINT , MMS BIGINT , MMS_SUCCESS BIGINT , MMS_FAIL BIGINT )
